intro: Elatostema fenkolense, commonly known as the African snowflake, is a small herbaceous plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettles and related species. The plant features delicate, heart-shaped leaves with a fine, silvery-white underside, giving it a distinctive appearance. It produces small, greenish-white flowers arranged in clusters, which are typically borne on slender stems. Elatostema fenkolense is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or rocky crevices.
